text.data: Matelite: I brought some![end]
Chapter 12 The Spy Operation[end]
Matelite: Hey, Taicho! I think we need to keep watch over the Empire's movements![end]
Taicho: Agreed! I want as much information as possible![end]
Matelite: Right! Let's send a spy into the Empire![end]

Hold on a moment!
I'll bring back some good spies who won't mind dying![end]
Donfan: Donfan, at your service! If it's information about girls you need, leave it to me![end]
I'm just an ordinary crew member... I'm scared.[end]
Sendak: ...Me?[end]

Matelite: This will be a perilous and possibly fatal mission!
So you get to choose, [character][0x1]![end]
Ladies and gentleman, you're our spy candidates!! If you're going to feel bitter, do so to [character][0x1]![end]

Matelite: !!!
What?![end]
Wait...!![end]
Ask Donfan Ask crew member Ask somebody else [0x28]to next page[0x29][end1]
Ask Sendak Matelite, you go! Previous people [0x28]to previous page[0x29][end1]

Donfan: Well... such is the way of the world...
I, Donfan, shall steal the hearts of 100 girls of the Empire.
Such is the way of the world... I shall return.[end]
Sendak: You chose me, [character][0x1]... Should I be happy? Should I be sad? I am not really sure...[end]
Matelite: Bwahaha!![end]
I can't go, I'm too famous! Taicho, you can be the spy![end]
Taicho: !!![end]
The perilous mission was a complete success.[end]
The mission ended in failure and the crew member returned...[end]
Matelite: Report![end]
The end of the crew member...[end]

Matelite: Understood! If we can put all the spy information together...
Sendak, please repeat the story![end]
There is still something I do not understand...[end]

Sendak: Emperor Sauzer read the Holy Dragon's mind... But, how? How could he do that? Afterwards, Emperor Sauzer became ill and unable to move...
But, once he becomes better, he will definitely seek out the Holy Dragons![end]
We must search for the Holy Dragons quickly!![end]
Matelite: Yes! In one word... please![end]
That night...[end]
But, wait... there's more.[end]

The battles from now on will be much more difficult than anything so far.
The Empire is in chaos. But if you look at it the other way, we too are suffering. But we have made it this far! We must not give up now![end]
Taicho: Sauzer somehow found a way to read the minds of the Holy Dragons! Something is going on... That is all I know!![end]
Matelite: We're going to find the Holy Dragons before Sauzer and revive Kahna![end]
It looks like [character][0x1] has arrived... Granbelos Empire's secret weapon... There's a sky monster here![end]
[character][0x1]!! Jump down! It's not that far. From that distance you could probably even feed the dragons...[end]

Sendak: Apparently Granbelos Castle is in chaos. First I listened to the speech.
At the speech podium was General Palpaleos... Emperor Sauzer was not to be found.[end]
General Palpaleos seemed to speak without confidence... The other generals seemed strange too... But...!! If General Palpaleos's speech is true, we're in trouble...!![end]

I was scared at the time... My mind was screaming...
It said, [0x24][character][0x1]... I'm sorry... Please forgive me for dying unhappily before you...[0x22][end]
Sendak: The generals don't seem to be getting along... Is it because of our resistance...? Is it because Sauzer fell ill...? Is it all because of the power of the Holy Dragons...?[end]
That is all that I saw... But now it is clear that we must search for the Holy Dragons before Sauzer recovers! Right, [character][0x1]?![end]
Matelite: Okay, I got it... Let's go over it one more time! Sendak, please repeat the story![end]
Taicho: Matelite!! I have returned![end]
Taicho: Here is a present! It should be useful for work on your autographed armor!![end]
No [0x24]welcome back[0x22]... No [0x24]thank you[0x22]... Nothing at all...[end]

Taicho: ......
The Empire was in complete disarray![end]

I slipped in to hear the speech, and no one noticed!
The citizens of the Empire were worried about Emperor Sauzer's illness and gathered there! However... there was one among the Granbelos generals who was delighted that Sauzer was sick! The general on the right named Gudolf was very strange! Gudolf is Lestat's superior officer...[end]
Taicho: Sauzer read the minds of a Holy Dragon! Just as [character][0x1] did! Do you remember what Sauzer said? It was like this...[end]
Such was my mission... My first girl was...[end]
Sauzer: I can become the man of legend without borrowing the princess's power![end]
Afterwards, I continued my spying! I snuck into Granbelos Castle and searched for Lestat![end]
It was difficult... No weapons, four generals... All I could do was hide. I will get even on the battlefield! I want to get back at them, together with you, Matelite![end]

That is all! That is the end of my report!!
......[end]
Donfan: I, Donfan, the spectacular spy, have returned unharmed![end]

Donfan: The Empire's female soldiers were quite strong.
But when a female soldier is separated, she becomes a single girl...
I used my kind words to bring you this information.[end]

Of course... not just information.
Yes... Short-lived loves with this fabulous spy...[end]
Donfan: Heh... a good girl...[end]

Then I infiltrated Granbelos Castle.
Heh, a spy's dangerous activities must go smoothly... they must go delicately... Like how one must treat a girl. It was a simple task for a fellow such as myself...[end]

What are they thinking about right now?
Are they thinking about Donfan, the dreamy spy?
Oh... I didn't even tell you my name. But I stole excellent information from you...[end]
If you must know why, it is because love is top secret![end]

Such is the way of the world...!!
I must be going now![end]
Taicho: I am excited... [character][0x1]... You go ahead...[end]
Taicho: Actually... there still is some information I am hiding... It is not something I can say to everybody. But I cannot say it alone either...[end]

Tonight... I want you to come with me to [character][0x1]'s room.
It is a secret mission. Come alone.[end]
Taicho: Please wake [character][0x1] up... Do it softly and gently...[end]
Taicho: The life of a spy is very difficult...[end]
Don't leave me alone...[end]
[character][0x1]: Eek! [character][0x1]!![end]
I'm sorry, but... at this time of night...[end]
No!! Get out![end]
Hornet told me... He said that this is the closest spot in [character][0x1] to the sky... Look, the sky is almost within arm's reach...[end]
Hey... [character][0x1]... Do you ever remember things when you look at the night sky? A bunch of things... When... I'm lonely... I always look at the sky...[end]
The truth is... I wish we could see it from closer up...[end]
Hey, [character][0x1]. What will happen to us? From now on...[end]

Will it work out...
Fighting... Worrying...
Like back then when we didn't know anything...[end]
It smells nice...[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]. Come stand next to me...[end]
Hornet: Go quickly! I'll look the other way just this time.[end]

Dragonkeeper: The Empire's secret weapon is amazing!
You can only get inside using a dragon to attack.[end]
Do you want to go back inside?[end]
Yep. Nah, I changed my mind.[end1]

I need to give the dragons a good bath afterwards...
They're really starting to get ripe...[end]
We're going to break into the enemy's secret weapon on our dragons. It might be a little dangerous. Should we go now?[end]
Feed Let's go!! Wait[end1]
You got a [0x24]Princess's ???[0x22]!![end]
Taicho: Her eyes... so soft... Did you not see them?[end]
Taicho: Please refrain from telling anyone... I will leave.[end]
Taicho: How was it? Please go next...[end]

Wait...
[character][0x1]... If we can see the sky... Let's go to the terrace.[end]
Taicho: [character][0x1]... I am very sorry to disturb you, but... I have something to tell you! I made a man-to-man promise at Granbelos Castle...[end]

I was hiding some... information for [character][0x1]...
I will let you hear it, [character][0x1]...[end]

After I left General Gudolf's room, I went even further into the castle... There was a small room there... In the room, was...
General Palpaleos...[end][end]
